item.title: "The Massacre of Chios" by Delacroix in detail
item.description: On April 11, 1822, the Turkish army crushed in blood the uprising of the population of the island of Chios.Â The artist paints his anger.

item.title: Sarah Arenson .. Judaism that brought down the Ottoman Empire
item.description: In July 1914, World War I broke out, when the assassination of Austrian Crown Prince Archduke Franz Ferdinand and his wife, in Sarajevo, sparked the war.
